additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: CARBONATED WATER (MINERAL WATER (83%), PURIFIED WATER), RECONSTITUTED JUICES ((APPLE (4.9%), RASPBERRY (0.1%)), FOOD ACID (CITRIC), NATURAL FLAVOUR, PRESERVATIVE (211), SWEETENERS (952, 955, 950), BLACK CARROT CONCENTRATE NATURAL COLOUR (ANTHOCYANIN#) # SOURCED FROM BLACK CARROTS.

description: Waterfords Lite & Fruity is the lighter, fruitier way of enjoying Sparkling Flavoured Mineral Water. Made from lightly carbonated natural mineral water and 5% fruit juice, Waterfords Lite & Fruity also contains no added sugar, in fact there is less than 30kJ per serve!
name: Lite & Fruity Apple Berry Sparkling natural Mineral Water
